title: Ex-finance minister wins runoff to be Costa Rica’s president - KMID - Local 2 News
content: Ex-finance minister wins runoff to be Costa Rica’s president  KMID - Local 2 News
description: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica (AP) — A former finance minister who surprised many by making it into Costa Rica’s presidential runoff vote has easily won that ballot and is to become the Central Americ…
